>::Kaiser::
>        Seeing the incoming shots he dives out of the way rolling back to 
>his
>feet between Perceptor and the retreating Maximals.  This fortunate roll 
>also
>allowed him to escape with only a minor cut to his wing from Devilcat's
>blade.  Wincing he fires another volley at both of his assailants, 
>Perceptor
>and the invisible enemy known only by his blade. As an after thought he 
>taps
>a button on his sheaths calling his scimitars back to their resting places.
